A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dear Disney\, please stop with the musical chairs directing. J.J. Abrams built something interesting in The Force Awakens only to have Rian Johnson to make The Force Went Back to Sleep. Johnson obviously doesn't love his subject material\, and it shows. Self righteous tinkering isn't needed\, just tell a cohesive story! If I accept this movie\, then everything that happened in The Force Awakens\, and even in the original trilogy\, doesn't matter anymore\, which I don't. Hopefully the next film will be a home run and I can just pretend this one doesn't exist.
